ED_Title: The situation in the temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine
ED_DecisionText: At its 102nd plenary meeting, on 9 September 2021, the General Assembly, by a recorded vote of 71 to 12, with 45 abstentions, (For voting results, see A/75/PV.102) decided to include the item entitled “The situation in the temporarily occupied territories of Ukraine” in the draft agenda of its seventy-sixth session.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
